description.value:
Aura 10

When a beast or magical beast ally in the aura drops and enemy in the aura below 1 hit point, that ally gains 1 action point that it must expend on its next turn or lose.
If Amon is dominated, stunned, or weakened, he is instead dazed for the same duration. While dazed, on each of his turns, Amon can take a minor action and a move or standard action.
Amon regains 15 hit points whenever he starts his turn and has at least 1 hit point. When he takes damage from a silvered weapon, his regeneration does not function on his next turn.
If Amon is immobilized, restrained, or slowed, he is instead slowed for the same duration. Difficult terrain does not cost Amon extra movement.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Attack: Melee 1 (one creature)

+32 vs. AC

Hit: 3d8 + 21 damage, or 4d8 + 23 damage to a prone target. If Amon has combat advantage against the target, the target falls prone.

At-Will âœ¦ thunder, weapon

Standard

Attack: 2 (one creature); +32 vs. AC

Hit: 2d10 + 23 damage, or 3d10 + 23 damage to a prone target. If Amon scores a critical hit, the target also takes ongoing 15 thunder damage and is dazed (save ends both).

At-Will

Standard

Effect: Amon uses howling mace and bite. He can also shift up to half his speed, splitting that movement among the moments before, between, and after his attacks.

Recharge 4-6 âœ¦ teleportation

Move

Effect: Amon teleports up to 10 squares.

Recharge when Amon's turn ends after he uses wolf gaze âœ¦ fear

Minor

Attack: Close blast 5 (one creature in the blast)

+30 vs. Will

Hit: The target falls prone. If it does not fall prone, it is instead immobilized until the end of Amon's next turn.

system.rechargeCondition: when Amon's turn ends after he uses wolf gaze

description.value:
Recharge when Amon's turn ends after he uses gaze of despair âœ¦ charm

Minor

Attack: Close blast 5 (one creature in the blast)

+30 vs. Will

Hit: The target is dazed until the end of Amon's next turn. If it is not dazed, it is instead immobilized until the end of Amon's next turn.

system.rechargeCondition: when Amon's turn ends after he uses gaze of despair

description.value:
At-Will

Triggered

Trigger: An attack hits Amon on his turn.

Effect (Immediate Interrupt): Amon gains +5 to all defenses until the end of his current turn.

system.biography:

Resist 25 cold, 25 fire 		Init +25 | AP 1 | Save +2
AC 41Fort 39Ref 40Will 39
Speed 10, climb 10, fly 10
Ability ScoresStr 26 (+21)
Con 24 (+20)		Dex 30 (+23)
Int 20 (+18)		Wis 20 (+18)
Cha 26 (+21)
Languages Common, Supernal
Alignment Evil
Skills Insight +23, Intimidate +26Senses Blindsight 5,Darkvision
Passive Perception 28 | Insight 33

Equipment heavy mace
